item.title: Discodoggy's PvP Pet Battles #275
item.description:
Channel: Discodoggy's Battles

Hundred Win Club Induction: Fire Pit Frolick S/B Blazehound (Obsidian Bite, Retrieve, Magma Trap) H/P Muck Slug (Slime Acidic Goo, Quicksand) P/P Frostwolf Ghostpup (Scratch, Haunting Song, Ghostly Bite) For the second video in a row I'm probably too tired to be making a video, but my team is about to hit 100 [...]

item.title: Pet Battle PvP | Random Queue 'n Stuff #2 | Three very boring matches :/

Just playing some random teams in the queue to chill... Discodoggy's blog for some Anomalus counters: Cursed Dune Watcher; Bronze Whelpling; Bloodbrood Whelpling ----------------vs---------------- 13:18 Death Adder Hatchling; Anubisath Idol; Magical Crawdad Rebellious [...]

item.title: Pet Battle tdScripts: A Basic How-To
item.description:
Channel: DragonsAfterDark

The goal of this video is to help others break into writing their own tdScripts for WoW Pet Battles. It's a work in progress and probably has a few topics/issues I missed. Please don't hesitate to offer constructive feedback or let me know if I missed anything. Timestamps: 1:59 -- Addons you'll need to run [...]

item.title: Discodoggy's PvP Pet Battles #265
item.description:
Channel: Discodoggy's Battles

Hundred Win Club Induction: Beige Bandits This is a very old MoP team that I started using due to running into Anomalus so much. It's great against AoE in general. S/S Qiraji Guardling (Crush, Sandstorm, Blackout Kick) H/P Living Sandling (Sand Bolt, Sandstorm, Quicksand) H/S Direhorn Runt (Trample, Horn [...]
